name: BME 105
title: Genetics in the Genomics Era
description: Principles of genetics and genomics focusing on how sequencing technologies enable us to understand gene function, genotype to phenotype relationships, and genetic inheritance.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: bioengineering, biomolecular engineering and bioinformatics, biotechnology, and bioinformatics majors and proposed majors and bioinformatics minors.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): BIOL 20A. Enrollment is restricted to bioengineering, biomolecular engineering and bioinformatics, biotechnology, and bioinformatics majors and proposed majors and bioinformatics minors.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section
